original: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko
analyzed: hetu paccayā bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā pañca pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava
